metadata.title: CVE-2023-24808 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: PDFio is a C library for reading and writing PDF files. In versions priorto 1.1.0 a denial of service (DOS) vulnerability exists in the pdfioparser. Crafted pdf files can cause the program to run at 100% utilizationand never terminate. The pdf which causes this crash found in testing isabout 28kb in size and was discovered via fuzzing. Anyone who uses thislibrary either as a standalone binary or as a library can be DOSed whenattempting to parse this type of file. Web servers or other automatedprocesses which rely on this code to turn pdf submissions into plaintextcan be DOSed when an attacker uploads the pdf. Please see the linked GHSAfor an example pdf. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no knownworkarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ippsample package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
